description:
Première`s Sylveon battled against Ash`s Froakie. Ash had never battled against a Fairy type Pokémon before but he was enthusiastic nonetheless. The battle ended after Ash`s Froakie became infatuated with Première`s Sylveon due to the Moonblast / Draining Kiss combo.
Première and Nymphia go out to the forest or the meadows every day and bring back wild Pokémon they`ve befriended to show the children so they can interact with Pokémon.
Première`s Sylveon was captured along with Pikachu but with Ash`s help, they were set free and it was returned to Première.
name: Nymphia (Premiere)
